title: erigon2 stuck at block 14826995
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `./erigon --version`

Erigon version: erigon version 2022.05.7-alpha-327e7d9

OS & Version: linux

Commit hash : 327e7d969cf4448153d54761b4f160faf306d0ad

#### Expected behaviour
Everything works ok

#### Actual behaviour
Execution failed on block 14826995

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
1. I synced erigon on ethereum mainnet via  ./build/bin/erigon --datadir=/data/erigon --private.api.addr=0.0.0.0:9090
2. the the node exist the error log:
    ```
    Execution failed        block=14826995 hash=0xbdb29f71505b70bcdc19fc0220e7303e1d4a2a52885807cb9251706ad2ccde43 err="could not apply tx 1 from block 14826995 [0x029d011a51368917f2c79a5ca3c8ea1f5da88847de0eabc8c938a4c32d5ae7f3]: nonce too low: address 0x0000f079e68BbCC79AB9600ace786B0a4dB1c83c, tx: 132397 state: 132398"
    ```
3.then eth block stuck with logs:
   ```
  INFO[05-26|02:30:36.238] [1/16 Headers] Wrote block headers       number=14826994 blk/second=0.000 alloc=3.6Gb sys=11.5Gb
INFO[05-26|02:30:36.238] Req/resp stats                           req=0 reqMin=0 reqMax=0 skel=0 skelMin=0 skelMax=0 resp=51 respMin=14832538 respMax=14845406
INFO[05-26|02:30:36.238] {14832538-14845406 links=12870 (14832538-14845401-14845406)} => f5b6a387681f23b6f9477d4a84b7524d5ea83609584631726f49e0239b5921d6
INFO[05-26|02:30:56.227] [snapshots] Dumping txs                  block num=14602250 alloc=4.6Gb sys=11.5Gb
INFO[05-26|02:30:56.237] [1/16 Headers] Wrote block headers       number=14826994 blk/second=0.000 alloc=4.6Gb sys=11.5Gb
INFO[05-26|02:30:56.237] Req/resp stats                           req=0 reqMin=0 reqMax=0 skel=0 skelMin=0 skelMax=0 resp=34 respMin=14827162 respMax=14845407
INFO[05-26|02:30:56.238] {14827162-14845407 links=18247 (14827162-14845401-14845407)} => c7dd9e13c171ffb33627a5595105466da724dab4905e2363f3d2c69bf7636d9b
INFO[05-26|02:31:16.238] [1/16 Headers] Wrote block headers       number=14826994 blk/second=0.000 alloc=3.6Gb sys=11.5Gb
INFO[05-26|02:31:16.238] Req/resp stats                           req=0 reqMin=0 reqMax=0 skel=0 skelMin=0 skelMax=0 resp=9 respMin=14826970 respMax=14828505
INFO[05-26|02:31:16.238] [snapshots] Dumping txs                  block num=14603005 alloc=3.6Gb sys=11.5Gb
INFO[05-26|02:31:36.230] [snapshots] Dumping txs                  block num=14603691 alloc=2.9Gb sys=11.6Gb
INFO[05-26|02:31:36.238] [1/16 Headers] Wrote block headers       number=14826994 blk/second=0.000 alloc=2.9Gb sys=11.6Gb
INFO[05-26|02:31:36.238] Req/resp stats                           req=0 reqMin=0 reqMax=0 skel=0 skelMin=0 skelMax=0 resp=13 respMin=14843488 respMax=14845408
INFO[05-26|02:31:36.238] {14843488-14845408 links=1921 (14843488-14845408)} => 4c86c71151a54e83b11dff6ee22150110561a60a9353a8d621d3ffcb3e3b3722
INFO[05-26|02:31:56.224] [snapshots] Dumping txs                  block num=14604399 alloc=3.9Gb sys=11.6Gb
INFO[05-26|02:31:56.237] [1/16 Headers] Wrote block headers       number=14826994 blk/second=0.000 alloc=3.9Gb sys=11.6Gb
INFO[05-26|02:31:56.237] Req/resp stats                           req=0 reqMin=0 reqMax=0 skel=0 skelMin=0 skelMax=0 resp=45 respMin=14837152 respMax=14845411
INFO[05-26|02:31:56.237] {14837152-14845411 links=8260 (14837152-14845411)} => c76dcdece75e4eea87c146282872dddd33909753b7fd8e25ca35698bf9699beb
INFO[05-26|02:32:07.392] [p2p] GoodPeers                          eth66=32
INFO[05-26|02:32:16.235] [snapshots] Dumping txs                  block num=14605090 alloc=4.9Gb sys=11.6Gb
INFO[05-26|02:32:16.237] [1/16 Headers] Wrote block headers       number=14826994 blk/second=0.000 alloc=4.9Gb sys=11.6Gb
INFO[05-26|02:32:16.237] Req/resp stats                           req=0 reqMin=0 reqMax=0 skel=0 skelMin=0 skelMax=0 resp=33 respMin=14832352 respMax=14845412
INFO[05-26|02:32:16.238] {14832352-14845412 links=13061 (14832352-14845412)} => 6b38f5f6a7162b202016799abaa742e3c7531a87ddff61ccf3c741637812c2ea
INFO[05-26|02:32:36.237] [1/16 Headers] Wrote block headers       number=14826994 blk/second=0.000 alloc=3.4Gb sys=11.7Gb
INFO[05-26|02:32:36.237] Req/resp stats                           req=0 reqMin=0 reqMax=0 skel=0 skelMin=0 skelMax=0 resp=29 respMin=14826976 respMax=14832351
INFO[05-26|02:32:36.487] [snapshots] Dumping txs                  block num=14605731 alloc=3.4Gb sys=11.7Gb
   ```
3.I try to fix use command bellow:
```
./build/bin/integration stage_headers --reset --datadir=/data/erigon
```
but it appears the same fault. 
now i use command : ./build/bin/integration print_stages --datadir=/data/erigon, logs bellow:
```
                         stage_at        prune_at
Headers                  14826994        0
BlockHashes              14826994        0
Bodies                   14826994        0
Senders                  14826994        0
Execution                14826994        14826994
Translation              0               0
HashState                14826994        0
IntermediateHashes       14826994        14826994
AccountHistoryIndex      14826994        0
StorageHistoryIndex      14826994        0
LogIndex                 14826994        0
CallTraces               14826994        14826994
TxLookup                 14826994        14700000
Finish                   14826994        0
--
prune distance:

sequence: EthTx=1612315500, NonCanonicalTx=1615623551

first header in db: 14600000
```
Any help to fix this issue would be appreciated.
There was one more fix after the last release, it will be included into the next release, or alternatively you can try from `devel`

If you still see this error try:
`./build/bin/integration state_stages --unwind=1000 --datadir=<your_datadir>`

> If you still see this error try: `./build/bin/integration state_stages --unwind=1000 --datadir=<your_datadir>`

I has tried the command:
```
./build/bin/integration state_stages --datadir=/data/erigon --unwind=1000
```
but exist the error logs:
```
panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
[signal SIGSEGV: segmentation violation code=0x1 addr=0x54 pc=0x10a76e2]

goroutine 1 [running]:
github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/eth/stagedsync.UnwindIntermediateHashesStage(0xc082186000, 0xc092baa0a0, {0x19faa88, 0xc004542180}, {{0x19f2140, 0xc000550000}, 0x1, {0xc0004d4d20, 0x15}, 0x1, ...}, ...)
        github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/eth/stagedsync/stage_interhashes.go:409 +0x202
github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/eth/stagedsync.DefaultStages.func26(0x80?, 0x145bc9c?, 0x12?, {0x19faa88?, 0xc004542180?})
        github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/eth/stagedsync/default_stages.go:130 +0x65
github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/eth/stagedsync.(*Sync).unwindStage(0xc000269080, 0x28?, 0xc08fc3bea0, {0x19f2140?, 0xc000550000}, {0x19faa88?, 0xc004542180})
        github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/eth/stagedsync/sync.go:351 +0x2eb
github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/eth/stagedsync.(*Sync).Run(0xc000269080, {0x19f2140, 0xc000550000}, {0x19faa88, 0xc004542180}, 0xa?)
        github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/eth/stagedsync/sync.go:204 +0x32f
github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/cmd/integration/commands.syncBySmallSteps({0x19f2140, 0xc000550000}, {0x0, 0x0, 0x0, {0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, ...}, ...}, ...)
        github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/cmd/integration/commands/state_stages.go:278 +0xb05
github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/cmd/integration/commands.glob..func24(0x2479340?, {0x1446a91?, 0x2?, 0x2?})
        github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/cmd/integration/commands/state_stages.go:65 +0x208
github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).execute(0x2479340, {0xc0004cd300, 0x2, 0x2})
        github.com/spf13/cobra@v1.4.0/command.go:856 +0x67c
github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).ExecuteC(0x247a740)
        github.com/spf13/cobra@v1.4.0/command.go:974 +0x3b4
github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).Execute(...)
        github.com/spf13/cobra@v1.4.0/command.go:902
github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).ExecuteContext(...)
        github.com/spf13/cobra@v1.4.0/command.go:895
main.main()
        github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/cmd/integration/main.go:15 +0x112
```
Any suggestions for the issues would be appreciated.

> 

Thanks for your suggestionï¼Œbut still not work. It stuck at this block:
```
INFO[05-29|10:16:16.035] [p2p] GoodPeers                          eth66=33
INFO[05-29|10:16:33.352] [1/16 Headers] Wrote block headers       number=14826994 blk/second=0.000 alloc=13.3Gb sys=21.4Gb
INFO[05-29|10:16:33.352] Req/resp stats                           req=0 reqMin=0 reqMax=0 skel=22474 skelMin=14828530 skelMax=14865370 resp=22476 respMin=14828530 respMax=14865891

INFO[05-29|10:16:53.352] Req/resp stats                           req=0 reqMin=0 reqMax=0 skel=23818 skelMin=14828530 skelMax=14865370 resp=23840 respMin=14828530 respMax=14865893

INFO[05-29|10:17:13.352] Req/resp stats                           req=0 reqMin=0 reqMax=0 skel=22782 skelMin=14828530 skelMax=14865370 resp=22783 respMin=14828530 respMax=14865894
```

> what if `./build/bin/integration state_stages --datadir=/data/erigon --unwind=1000 --syncmode=snap` ?

The command worked,and no errors happens when i run ./build/bin/integration state_stages --datadir=/data/erigon --unwind=1000 --syncmode=snap, but still stuck at block 14825996. logs bellow:
```
INFO[05-30|00:28:09.103] [1/16 Headers] Wrote block headers       number=14825996 blk/second=0.000 alloc=5.1Gb sys=9.6Gb
INFO[05-30|00:28:09.103] Req/resp stats                           req=0 reqMin=0 reqMax=0 skel=0 skelMin=0 skelMax=0 resp=11 respMin=14869555 respMax=14869555

```

> > what if `./build/bin/integration state_stages --datadir=/data/erigon --unwind=1000 --syncmode=snap` ?
> 
> The command worked,and no errors happens when i run ./build/bin/integration state_stages --datadir=/data/erigon --unwind=1000 --syncmode=snap, but still stuck at block 14825996. logs bellow:
> 
> ```
> INFO[05-30|00:28:09.103] [1/16 Headers] Wrote block headers       number=14825996 blk/second=0.000 alloc=5.1Gb sys=9.6Gb

```
Handling incoming message                stream=RecvMessage err="decode BlockBodiesPacket66: rlp: input list has too many elements for eth.BlockRawBodiesPacket66"
```

> > > what if `./build/bin/integration state_stages --datadir=/data/erigon --unwind=1000 --syncmode=snap` ?
> > 
> > 
> > The command worked,and no errors happens when i run ./build/bin/integration state_stages --datadir=/data/erigon --unwind=1000 --syncmode=snap, but still stuck at block 14825996. logs bellow:

finally the error is not matter. The erigon works normally.Thanks for your reply.
